column4: Hey all! I am duel booting linux/windows7. should I use gparted before, or after the windows installation?
just curious, what feels better win7 or linux and what flavor of linux btw :)

I have never used win 7, but need to for work stuff. I will use karmic once it comes out. I have to use fedora until karmic because gpu is too new. I love ubuntu to answer your question. will you anser mine?
oh no i am a very noobish linux user, dunno much about gparted
